steps.name: user opens browser
login page is loaded
login button is active
UTS Staff Member logs in
completing order form
system should have both drop down options and text fields
submitting an incomplete form
system should show an error message when incomplete field AND when input is invalid
submitting form
system should show a successful submission screen
Receptionist fills in login details
selects login button
system should process login and direct to the dashboard

steps.name: dashboard should contain 'Request Form' and 'View All Stationery Requests' buttons
Stockroom fills in login details
Stockroom selects login button
system should process login and direct to the stockroom dashboard
tries to view all the orders placed
the system should show a table of the orders placed on the view orders screen
try to change the status of an order, the system should provide me with a drop-down menu of options
These options should include 'pending', ‘in progress’, ‘in transit’ and ‘complete’
I change the status of an order
system should present feedback with the message “The order status fields have been updated successfully.”

name: Test open StationarySystemURL
description: Verify if the log in interface is functioning
